reviews.text:
5 stars for a peaceful retreat on Orchard Road!

Al-Falah Mosque is a serene oasis in the city’s busy heart. Clean, spacious, and well-organized, it’s perfect for a quick, quiet prayer break amidst the bustle. Staff are welcoming and keep everything running smoothly, making everyone feel at home. A must visit for anyone needing a calm escape nearby!

Clean. With lift. Happy for we get to pray on time at town area. Place to meet fellow muslim. Alhamdulillah. Maybe can re-locate hanging items hook behind wudhu area for easy care & convenient? Especially if going there, alone.

A very clean and well equipped mosque in the middle of the city. A must go place
when i come to Sg. Toilets are clean, spacious. They even provide drinking water.

Not very massive and big but such a unique mosque perhaps the one specific in Singapore.
A must visit place for all Muslim visitors who go to Singapore.
You can say that it is mix of modern and orthodox Islamic values blended in modest way.
Proximity is easy n accessible, main downtown, very near walking distance from famous Ion mall.
If you would wish to see an established prayer place in the middle of Manhattan, NY, it's the simulation in Singapore.

Nice masjid in the middle of orchard road Singapore. Very clean toilets and ablution facilities. Huge ceiling fans render coolness in the main prayer hall. Pleasant retreat to recharge and pray  after a hot and humid afternoon walking in downtown Singapore
